form.label: Call Log
form.description: Note: Not all calls have recordings.

search.query: `default_index` | lookup host_lookup.csv host OUTPUT hostname | eval officeNames = if(isnull(hostname),host,hostname) | dedup officeNames | table host, officeNames | sort + host

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" | where dst_type=0 OR src_type=0 | eval ext = if(dst_type=0, dst_display_name+" ("+dst_caller_number+")", src_display_name+" ("+src_caller_number+")") | eval extn = if(dst_type=0, dst_caller_number, src_caller_number) | dedup extn | sort + ext | table ext, extn
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" (dst_type=1 OR dst_type=13) (src_type=1) | eval externum = if(src_type=1,src_caller_number,dst_caller_number) | dedup externum | table externum

choice.value: src_type!=1 AND src_type!=0 AND dst_type!=13 AND dst_type!=1

input.default: src_type=1 OR src_type=0,dst_type=13 OR dst_type=1,src_type!=1 AND src_type!=0 AND dst_type!=13 AND dst_type!=1
input.initialValue: src_type=1 OR src_type=0,dst_type=13 OR dst_type=1,src_type!=1 AND src_type!=0 AND dst_type!=13 AND dst_type!=1

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" $hosts4$ $iext$ $exnums$ $pcallid$ $qcallopt$ $calldire$ | eval call_start_time = strftime(strptime(call_start_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p%z") | eval recording_url = if(isnull(recording_url), "NOREC", recording_url) | eval rec_url = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(recording_url, "\)", "%2529"), "\(", "%2528"), " ", "%2520"), "\]", "%255D"), "\[", "%255B"), "%3A", "%25253A"), "\/", "%252F") | eval hst = lower(host) | eval rec_link = if(rec_url="NOREC",rec_url,"https://"+hst+":5001/#/download_record/"+rec_url) | stats count by call_id, call_start_time ,seq_order, start_time, end_time, src_caller_number, src_display_name, dst_caller_number, dst_display_name, action, rec_link | fields - count | sort -call_id, + seq_order | rename call_id as "Call ID", call_start_time as "Call Time", rec_link as Recording | stats list(seq_order) as Sequence, list(start_time) as "Start Time", list(end_time) as "End Time", list(src_caller_number) as "Source Number", list(src_display_name) as "Source Name", list(dst_caller_number) as "Dest. Number", list(dst_display_name) as "Dest. Name", list(action) as "Action" by "Call ID", "Call Time", Recording | sort - "Call ID", + seq_order
